nodes.text: The Field Guide to Trammic Reptavians

The Field Guide to Trammic Reptavians was a book. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the Besalisk Dexter Jettster looked through a box of reading material on the planet Pashvi that contained the field guide. Jettster purchased the book that would become known as the Smuggler's Guide from the box, which had been tucked between The Biography of Master Thief Makuta and The Field Guide to Trammic Reptavians.
The Field Guide to Trammic Reptavians was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
